thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by BARBARA B Customer

author: BARBARA B Customer
title: BARBARA B Customer
text: I WAS SO IMPRESSED WITH MY FIRST EXPERIENCE, THAT TOWN FAIR TIRE IN WILLISTON EASILY BECAME MY "GO TO" PLACE FOR ALL MY TIRE NEEDS - PRESENT AND FUTURE. FAST SERVICE/FAIR PRICING/AND A FANTASTIC CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE!
